ComicInfo.Title: The Standoff Chapter Three
ComicInfo.Series: John Carpenter's Tales of Science Fiction: The Standoff
ComicInfo.Summary:
While hardboiled convict FRAISER BONNER continues to execute prison guards with impunity, the forces surrounding TATTERSALL PRISON struggle to cope with an alien invasion that threatens to spill over into the rest of the world. No negotiation. No parley. Extraterrestrial expert CONRAD GANT, forced into hiding by the government, finds himself drafted to help the very agencies that disavowed him.
Note: The digital edition (9/5/2018) for this issue was released before the print edition.
